title: Lawrence of Arabia
creator_credit: Columbia, Horizon (GB), Sam Spiegel and David Lean
brief_description: A sweeping, breathtaking epic covering the life of T. E. Lawrence who throughout his two years in Arabia during the First World War succeeded in uniting the Arab tribes against the Turks to become a legend in his own time, the great Lawrence of Arabia. Starring Peter O’Toole, Omar Sharif and Alec Guinness.
